data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_021_0
data.text:
ONE EVENING LEANING OVER THE
                TAFFRAIL, I'OBSERVED A STRANGE CLOUD
                THAT STRUCK A CHILL TO MY HEART.

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_021_1
data.text:
SUDDENLY IT BECAME INTOLERABLY
                HOT AND EVERY BREATH WIND DIED AWAY. i
                WENT BELOW WITH A FEELING OF
                APPROACHING EVIL.

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_021_2
data.text:
I TOLD THE CAPTAIN OF MY
                FEARS, BUT HE PAID NO ATTENTION TO WHAT I
                SAID AND LEFT WITHOUT DEIGNING TO
                REPLY.

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_021_3
data.text:
MY UNEASINESS KEPT ME FROM
                SLEEPING, AND ABOUT MIDNIGHT I DECIDED
                TO GO ON DECK.

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_021_4
data.text:
AS I PLACED MY FOOT ON THE
                UPPER RUNG OF THE COMPANION LADDER, I WAS
                STARLED BY A LOUD AND FRIGHTTENING
                HUMMING NOISE!

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_021_5
data.text: AS I STEPPED ON DECK I FOUND THE SHIP QUIVERING LIKE A STRIKEN BEAST.
